author: TravisEz13
body:
the product id in the macOS package for preview 3 wasn't changed to com.microsoft.powershell-preview

This prevents the packages from being able to be uninstalled separately.

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: Discovered during the creation of the powershell-preview cask https://github.com/Homebrew/homebrew-cask-versions/pull/5815

title: the product id in the macOS package for preview 3 wasn't changed to com.microsoft.powershell-preview
